title: Excel to Tekla Automation
description: Automated tool that reads structural member data from Excel spreadsheets and creates Tekla Structures models with proper profiles, materials, and positioning.

inputOutput.input: Excel spreadsheet with member schedules, coordinates, and profile sizes
inputOutput.output: Complete Tekla model with beams, columns, and bracing positioned accurately

title: AutoCAD Drawing Generator
description: Script that auto-generates standardized AutoCAD detail drawings from Tekla model data including dimensions, annotations, and title blocks.

inputOutput.input: Tekla Structures model with connection details
inputOutput.output: Ready-to-print AutoCAD detail drawings with dimensions

title: Bolt Dimension Automation
description: Automated bolt pattern calculator and dimensioner that applies standardized bolt spacing, edge distances, and creates bolt schedule reports.

inputOutput.output: Optimized bolt pattern with edge distances and schedule

title: Report Generation Scripts
description: Automated reporting system that extracts model data from Tekla and generates formatted reports including material takeoff, bolt lists, and weld summaries.

inputOutput.output: Formatted PDF reports with BOQ, material lists, and bolt schedules
